full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DREGS PA SDE BRGYAD LA GSER SKYEMS GTOR BA'I CHO GA BDUD RTZIS BRLABS 'PHRENG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES DREGS PA SDE BRGYAD LA GSER SKYEMS GTONG BA'I CHO GA BDUD RTZIS BRLABS 'PHRENG ZHES BYANG, 'DI NI BSOD NAMS KYI STOBS @004B KYIS MNGON PAR MTHO DUR BED WANG PHUN TSOGS BSAM GRUB KYIS RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I SKYES DANG BCAS PA 'PHRIN YIG GI LAM NAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR KU SA LI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS PHAG TU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI GU SHRI NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL LO, ,DGE'O, ,)
